definition: Shimian county in Ya'an 雅安[Ya3 an1], Sichuan
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton

sentences.english: But, the forestry management work of Shimian county is in traditional working stage.
sentences.chinese: 但是，石棉縣的林業管理工作處於傳統工作階段。
